title: lambda and pi-Systems, Rings of Sets
content: Because they are not widely used outside of measure theory, we do not introduce specific definitions for lambda- and pi-systems. Instead, we define ` P ` and ` L ` respectively as the classes of pi- and lambda-systems in ` O ` throughout this section.

blocks.name: ispisys
blocks.content: The property of being a pi-system. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 10-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ispisys(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wss(cfv(cfi, c0), c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, cpw(cpw(c2)), wss(cfv(cfi, cv(s0)), cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  elrab2(s0, c0, c1, cpw(cpw(c2)), wss(cfv(cfi, c0), c0), wss(cfv(cfi, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  sseq12d(cfv(cfi, cv(s0)), cv(s0), cfv(cfi, c0), c0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(s0), c0, cfi)
  id(wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cpw(c2))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wss.s(s0, cfv(cfi, c0), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfi, c0)
  diff.cfi.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ispisys2
blocks.content: The property of being a pi-system, expanded version. Pi-systems are closed under finite intersections. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ispisys2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wral(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), c0))))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s1, cpw(cpw(c2)), wss(cfv(cfi, cv(s1)), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wral(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), c0)))), diffss(s0, s1))
  bitri(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wral(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wss(cfv(cfi, c0), c0)))
  ispisys(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wss(cfv(cfi, c0), c0), wral(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), c0)))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wss(cfv(cfi, c0), c0), wral(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), c0)), wral(hs0, cfv(cfi, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  dfss3(hs0, cfv(cfi, c0), c0)
  ralxfrd(hs0, s0, cfv(cfi, c0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), cint(cv(s0)), wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), c0))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)))), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), cfv(cfi, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wss(cv(s0), c0), wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), cfn))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, cpw(cpw(c2)))
  elpwid(cv(s0), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)))))
  elin1d(cv(s0), cpw(c0), cfn, wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)))))
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)))), wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)))
  elin2d(cv(s0), cfn, cpw(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)))))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wne(cv(s0), emptycls))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))))
  eldifsn(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn), emptycls)
  elfir(c0, universe, cv(s0))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfi, c0)), wrex(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(cv(s0)))))
  elfi2(s0, c0, cpw(cpw(c2)), cv(hs0))
  eleq1d(cv(hs0), c0, cint(cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(cv(s0)))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfi, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)))
  diff.hs0.c(cint(cv(s0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfi, c0)
  diff.cfi.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cint(cv(s0)), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cpw(cpw(c2)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cpw(c2))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm ispisys2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà P(P(c2))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), ‚ãÇ s0 ‚àà c0)))
  ‚ä£ c1 = { s1 ‚àà P(P(c2))|(fi ` s1)‚äÜ s1 }
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà P(P(c2))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), ‚ãÇ s0 ‚àà c0))), d(s0, s1))
  bitri(c0 ‚àà c1, (c0 ‚àà P(P(c2))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), ‚ãÇ s0 ‚àà c0)), (c0 ‚àà P(P(c2))‚àß(fi ` c0)‚äÜ c0))
  ispisys(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  pm5.32i(c0 ‚àà P(P(c2)), (fi ` c0)‚äÜ c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), ‚ãÇ s0 ‚àà c0))
  syl5bb(c0 ‚àà P(P(c2)), (fi ` c0)‚äÜ c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), ‚ãÇ s0 ‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(fi ` c0), hs0 ‚àà c0))
  dfss3(hs0, (fi ` c0), c0)
  ralxfrd(hs0, s0, (fi ` c0), ((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), ‚ãÇ s0, c0 ‚àà P(P(c2)), hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚ãÇ s0 ‚àà c0)
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà P(P(c2))‚àß s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ })), ‚ãÇ s0 ‚àà(fi ` c0), c0 ‚àà ùïå, s0 ‚äÜ c0, s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, s0 ‚àà Fin)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà P(P(c2)), s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, P(P(c2)))
  elpwid(s0, c0, (c0 ‚àà P(P(c2))‚àß s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ })))
  elin1d(s0, P(c0), cfn, (c0 ‚àà P(P(c2))‚àß s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ })))
  simprd((c0 ‚àà P(P(c2))‚àß s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ })), s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, s0 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))
  elin2d(s0, cfn, P(c0), (c0 ‚àà P(P(c2))‚àß s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ })))
  simpld((c0 ‚àà P(P(c2))‚àß s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ })), s0 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  sylib((c0 ‚àà P(P(c2))‚àß s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ })), (s0 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)‚àß s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ), s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà P(P(c2)), s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }))
  eldifsn(s0, (P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), emptycls)
  elfir(c0, universe, s0)
  biimpa(c0 ‚àà P(P(c2)), hs0 ‚àà(fi ` c0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), hs0 = ‚ãÇ s0))
  elfi2(s0, c0, P(P(c2)), hs0)
  eleq1d(hs0, c0, ‚ãÇ s0, (c0 ‚àà P(P(c2))‚àß hs0 = ‚ãÇ s0))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà P(P(c2)), hs0 = ‚ãÇ s0)
  diff.hs0.c((fi ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }))
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÇ s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfi, c0)
  diff.cfi.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà P(P(c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(‚ãÇ s0 ‚àà c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, P(P(c2)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, P(c2))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.name: inelpisys
blocks.content: Pi-systems are closed under pairwise intersections. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm inelpisys(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(cin(c2, c3), c0))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, cpw(cpw(c4)), wss(cfv(cfi, cv(s0)), cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cin(c2, c3), c0, cint(cpr(c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wceq(cint(cpr(c2, c3)), cin(c2, c3)))
  intprg(c2, c0, c3, c0)
  rspcdva(hs0, cpr(c2, c3), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(cint(cpr(c2, c3)), c0), wcel(cint(cv(hs0)), c0))
  eleq12d(cint(cv(hs0)), c0, cint(cpr(c2, c3)), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c2, c3)))
  inteq(cv(hs0), cpr(c2, c3))
  eqidd(c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c2, c3)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wral(hs0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(hs0)), c0)))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, c1), wral(hs0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c4))))
  ispisys2(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c4)
  eldifd(cpr(c2, c3), cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)))
  elind(cpr(c2, c3), cpw(c0), cfn, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(cpr(c2, c3), cpw(c0)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(cpr(c2, c3), cpw(c0)), wss(cpr(c2, c3), c0))
  prssi(c2, c0, c3)
  elpw(cpr(c2, c3), c0)
  prex(c2, c3)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(cpr(c2, c3), cfn))
  prfi(c2, c3)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wn(wcel(cpr(c2, c3), csn(emptycls))), wn(wceq(cpr(c2, c3), emptycls)))
  neneqd(cpr(c2, c3), emptycls, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(cpr(c2, c3), emptycls))
  prnzg(c2, c0, c3)
  con3i(wceq(cpr(c2, c3), emptycls), wcel(cpr(c2, c3), csn(emptycls)))
  elsni(cpr(c2, c3), emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(cpr(c2, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cint(cpr(c2, c3)), c0))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

thm inelpisys(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0)‚Üí(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 = { s0 ‚àà P(P(c4))|(fi ` s0)‚äÜ s0 }
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqeltrrd((c2 ‚ãÇ c3), c0, ‚ãÇ { c2, c3 }, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0))
  3adant1(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c0, ‚ãÇ { c2, c3 } =(c2 ‚ãÇ c3))
  intprg(c2, c0, c3, c0)
  rspcdva(hs0, { c2, c3 }, ((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0), ‚ãÇ { c2, c3 } ‚àà c0, ‚ãÇ hs0 ‚àà c0)
  eleq12d(‚ãÇ hs0, c0, ‚ãÇ { c2, c3 }, c0, hs0 = { c2, c3 })
  inteq(hs0, { c2, c3 })
  eqidd(c0, hs0 = { c2, c3 })
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), ‚ãÇ hs0 ‚àà c0))
  simprbi(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), ‚ãÇ hs0 ‚àà c0), c0 ‚àà P(P(c4)))
  ispisys2(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c4)
  eldifd({ c2, c3 }, (P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), { ‚àÖ }, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0))
  elind({ c2, c3 }, P(c0), cfn, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0))
  3adant1(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c0, { c2, c3 } ‚àà P(c0))
  sylibr((c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0), { c2, c3 } ‚àà P(c0), { c2, c3 } ‚äÜ c0)
  prssi(c2, c0, c3)
  elpw({ c2, c3 }, c0)
  prex(c2, c3)
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0), { c2, c3 } ‚àà Fin)
  prfi(c2, c3)
  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0), ¬¨ { c2, c3 } ‚àà { ‚àÖ }, ¬¨ { c2, c3 } = ‚àÖ)
  neneqd({ c2, c3 }, emptycls, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0))
  3ad2ant2(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c0, { c2, c3 } ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  prnzg(c2, c0, c3)
  con3i({ c2, c3 } = ‚àÖ, { c2, c3 } ‚àà { ‚àÖ })
  elsni({ c2, c3 }, emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c({ c2, c3 })
  diff.hs0.c(((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }))
  diff.hs0.w(‚ãÇ { c2, c3 } ‚àà c0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

blocks.name: sigapisys
blocks.content: All sigma-algebras are pi-systems. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sigapisys(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(cfv(csiga, c0), c1)
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, cpw(cpw(c0)), wss(cfv(cfi, cv(s0)), cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, cfv(csiga, c0), c1)
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(c0))), wral(hs1, cdif(cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))
  jca(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(c0))), wral(hs1, cdif(cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(c0))), wss(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)))
  sigasspw(cv(hs0), c0)
  selpw(hs0, cpw(c0))
  ralrimiva(hs1, cdif(cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cint(cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))
  syl22anc(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), csn(emptycls)))), wcel(cint(cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs1), cdom, com), wne(cv(hs1), emptycls))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(crn(csiga))))
  elrnsiga(cv(hs0), c0)
  elin1d(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), csn(emptycls)))))

blocks.name: isldsys
blocks.content: The property of being a lambda-system or Dynkin system. Lambda-systems contain the empty set, are closed under complement, and closed under countable disjoint union. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Jun-2020.)

  eleq2(s2, c0, emptycls)

blocks.name: pwldsys

thm pwldsys(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(cpw(c0)))), wcel(cuni(cv(s1)), cpw(c0)), wss(cuni(cv(s1)), c0))

  elpwi(cv(s1), cpw(c0))

blocks.name: unelldsys
blocks.content: Lambda-systems are closed under disjoint set unions. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: sigaldsys
blocks.content: All sigma-algebras are lambda-systems. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sigaldsys(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(cfv(csiga, c0), c1)
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, cpw(cpw(c0)), w3a(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wcel(cuni(cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, cfv(csiga, c0), c1)
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(c0))), w3a(wcel(emptycls, cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wcel(cuni(cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))))
  jca(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(c0))), w3a(wcel(emptycls, cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wcel(cuni(cv(s1)), cv(hs0))))))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(c0))), wss(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)))
  sigasspw(cv(hs0), c0)
  selpw(hs0, cpw(c0))
  3jca(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(emptycls, cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wcel(cuni(cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(emptycls, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(crn(csiga))))
  0elsiga(cv(hs0))
  ralrimiva(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(crn(csiga))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cv(hs0)))
  baselsiga(cv(hs0), c0)
  simpr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  difelsiga(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))
  ralrimiva(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wcel(cuni(cv(s1)), cv(hs0))))
  ex(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(cv(hs0)))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wcel(cuni(cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(cv(hs0)))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wcel(cuni(cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com))
  ad2antrr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(cv(hs0))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(crn(csiga))))
  elrnsiga(cv(hs0), c0)
  simplr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(cv(hs0))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  simprl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(cv(hs0)))), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wdisj(s2, cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  sigaclcu(cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  isldsys(s1, s2, s0, cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(csiga, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cfv(csiga, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, csiga, c0)
  diff.csiga.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm sigaldsys(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (sigAlgebra ` c0)‚äÜ c1
  ‚ä£ c1 = { s0 ‚àà P(P(c0))|(‚àÖ ‚àà s0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà s0,(c0 \ s1)‚àà s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(s0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí ‚ãÉ s1 ‚àà s0)))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, (sigAlgebra ` c0), c1)
  sylibr(hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0), hs0 ‚àà c1, (hs0 ‚àà P(P(c0))‚àß(‚àÖ ‚àà hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs0,(c0 \ s1)‚àà hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(hs0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí ‚ãÉ s1 ‚àà hs0)))))
  jca(hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0), hs0 ‚àà P(P(c0)), (‚àÖ ‚àà hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs0,(c0 \ s1)‚àà hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(hs0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí ‚ãÉ s1 ‚àà hs0))))
  sylibr(hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0), hs0 ‚àà P(P(c0)), hs0 ‚äÜ P(c0))
  sigasspw(hs0, c0)
  selpw(hs0, P(c0))
  3jca(hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0), ‚àÖ ‚àà hs0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs0,(c0 \ s1)‚àà hs0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(hs0),((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí ‚ãÉ s1 ‚àà hs0)))
  syl(hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0), ‚àÖ ‚àà hs0, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra))
  0elsiga(hs0)
  ralrimiva(s1, hs0, hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0), (c0 \ s1)‚àà hs0)
  syl3anc((hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0)‚àß s1 ‚àà hs0), (c0 \ s1)‚àà hs0, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), c0 ‚àà hs0, s1 ‚àà hs0)
  adantr(hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0), s1 ‚àà hs0, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra))
  adantr(hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0), s1 ‚àà hs0, c0 ‚àà hs0)
  baselsiga(hs0, c0)
  simpr(hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0), s1 ‚àà hs0)
  difelsiga(hs0, c0, s1)
  ralrimiva(s1, P(hs0), hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0), ((s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))‚Üí ‚ãÉ s1 ‚àà hs0))
  ex((hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0)‚àß s1 ‚àà P(hs0)), (s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2)), ‚ãÉ s1 ‚àà hs0)
  syl3anc(((hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0)‚àß s1 ‚àà P(hs0))‚àß(s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))), ‚ãÉ s1 ‚àà hs0, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), s1 ‚àà P(hs0), s1[‚âº]_om)
  ad2antrr(hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0), s1 ‚àà P(hs0), (s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2)), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra))
  elrnsiga(hs0, c0)
  simplr(hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0), s1 ‚àà P(hs0), (s1[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2)))
  simprl((hs0 ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` c0)‚àß s1 ‚àà P(hs0)), s1[‚âº]_om, ‚äî(s2 ‚àà s1, s2))
  sigaclcu(hs0, s1)
  isldsys(s1, s2, s0, hs0, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c((sigAlgebra ` c0))

  diff.csiga.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)

  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

blocks.name: ldsysgenld
blocks.content: The intersection of all lambda-systems containing a given collection of sets ` A ` , which is called the lambda-system generated by ` A ` , is itself also a lambda-system. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ldsysgenld(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cint(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0)))), c0))
  -| wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(cpw(c2)), w3a(wcel(emptycls, cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wcel(cdif(c2, cv(s2)), cv(s1))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wdisj(s3, cv(s2), cv(s3))), wcel(cuni(cv(s2)), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cpw(c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cint(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0)))), c0)), diffsc(s2, c3))
  sylibr(w0, wcel(cint(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0)))), c0), wa(wcel(cint(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0)))), cpw(cpw(c2))), w3a(wcel(emptycls, cint(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))))), wral(s2, cint(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0)))), wcel(cdif(c2, cv(s2)), cint(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0)))))), wral(s2, cpw(cint(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wdisj(s3, cv(s2), cv(s3))), wcel(cuni(cv(s2)), cint(crab(s0, c0, wss(c1, cv(s0))))))))))

  -| wnf(s0, w0)

  -| diffss(s1, s4)

blocks.name: dynkin
blocks.content: Dynkin's lambda-pi theorem: if a lambda-system contains a pi-system, it also contains the sigma-algebra generated by that pi-system. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2020.)

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))

blocks.name: isros
blocks.content: The property of being a rings of sets, i.e. containing the empty set, and closed under finite union and set complement. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Jul-2020.)

thm rossspw(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, cpw(c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, cpw(cpw(c2)), wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cun(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wcel(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  elpwid(c0, cpw(c2), wcel(c0, c1))
  simp1bi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wcel(emptycls, c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cun(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cdif(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))))
  isros(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

thm unelros(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  simpld(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(cun(c2, c3), c0), wcel(cdif(c2, c3), c0))

  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0))

  simp3bi(wcel(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cun(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cdif(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))), wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c4))), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  isros(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c4)
  rspc2va(hs0, hs1, c2, c0, c3, c0, wa(wcel(cun(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cdif(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)), wa(wcel(cun(c2, c3), c0), wcel(cdif(c2, c3), c0)), wa(wcel(cun(c2, cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cdif(c2, cv(hs1)), c0)))

  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(cun(c2, cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cdif(c2, cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cun(c2, c3), c0), wcel(cdif(c2, c3), c0))

  uneq2(cv(hs1), c3, c2)
  eleq1d(cdif(c2, cv(hs1)), c0, cdif(c2, c3), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))

blocks.name: issros
blocks.content: The property of being a semirings of sets, i.e., collections of sets containing the empty set, closed under finite intersection, and where complements can be written as finite disjoint unions. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Jul-2020.)

thm srossspw(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, cpw(c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, cpw(cpw(c2)), wa(wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cin(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wrex(s3, cpw(cv(s0)), w3a(wcel(cv(s3), cfn), wdisj(s4, cv(s3), cv(s4)), wceq(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cuni(cv(s3)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
} = {
  elpwid(c0, cpw(c2), wcel(c0, c1))
  simp1bi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cpw(cpw(c2))), wcel(emptycls, c0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cin(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wrex(s3, cpw(c0), w3a(wcel(cv(s3), cfn), wdisj(s4, cv(s3), cv(s4)), wceq(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cuni(cv(s3)))))))))
  issros(s1, s2, s3, s4, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s4, s0)
}
